rukus.text: Walwesedwe awala wawakanile mu wanache wa Israila ni lulimi lwa Daudi ni Isa mwanache jwa Maryam, yalakweyo ligongo lya kunyosya kwao, soni waliji ali nkusumba mpika
Nganawaga nkukanyana pa yakusakala yaaitesile, kaje kusakala nnope yawaliji nkutenda

Timwaone wajinji mwa jamanjao (Ayuda) ali nkusyowekana nao awala wakanile (makafili gacharabu, kuti awupute ngondo Usilamu), kaje kusakala nnope yaajilongochesye mitima jao! Mwanti Allah wakasilichile, soni mu ilagasyo tachiwa wandamo
Mwanti angawe ali nkunkulupilila Allah ni Ntume (Muhammadi ﷺ) kwisa soni yaitulusyidwe kukwakwe, nga nganiwatenda kuwa asyowe, nambo kuti wajinji mwa jamanjao wakunyosya

Chisimu chene timwasimane wandu wali wakupundanganya nnope utinda kwa wandu waakulupilile; ni Ayuda kwisa soni wakuwanganya (Allah ni isanamu), soni chisimu chene timwasimane wali wakuwandichila wao nnope ku chinonyelo chakwanonyela wandu wakulupilila; ni awala wakutiji: “Chisimu uwwe ni Akilisito.” Yalakweyo ligongo lyanti mwa wanganyao mwana achalijiganye ya dini kwisa soni wakun’jogopa Nnungu, soni nikuti wanganyao wangalikwesya

Soni pati apikene (Akilisitowo) yaitulusyidwe kwa Ntenga (Muhammadi ﷺ ), tin'gaone meso gao gali nkulakatisya misosi ligongo lya yakuona yaimanyi, achitiji: “Ambuje wetu! Tukulupilile. Basi tulembani pamo ni akuwichila umboni (yakuonayi).”

Ni (watite pakwajanga akwagamba ligongo lyakunda Usilamu): “Chantiuli tukankulupilila Allah ni yakuona yaituichilile, kutendaga tunankun’jembecheya M’mbuje gwetu kuti akatujinjisye (ku Mbepo) pamo ni wandu wambone?”
Basi ligongo lya yawawechete, Allah walipile Matimbe ga ku Mbepo gasikujilima cha pasi pakwe sulo, chakawe wandamo mwalakwemo, soni galakwego nimalipilo ga wakolosya
Nambo wandu waakufuulu ni kanila ma Aya Getu, wanganyao niwandu wa ku Moto Waukali
